SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT User_.userId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM User_ INNER JOIN users_groups ug ON User_.userId = ug.userId INNER JOIN lms_course co ON co.groupCreatedId = ug.groupId LEFT JOIN usergrouprole ur ON ug.userId = ur.userId AND ur.groupId = ug.groupId AND ur.roleId= ? LEFT JOIN usergrouprole urE ON ug.userId = urE.userId AND urE.groupId = ug.groupId AND urE.roleId = ? [$JOINTEAM$] [$JOIN$] WHERE [$WHERE$] ur.userId IS NULL AND urE.userId IS NULL AND co.courseId = ? [$WHERESTATUS$] [$WHERESEARCH$]
INNER JOIN users_teams ON users_teams.userId = User_.userId AND users_teams.teamId IN ([$TEAMIDS$])
INNER JOIN lms_courseresult ON lms_courseresult.userId = User_.userId AND lms_courseresult.courseId = co.courseId AND lms_courseresult.passedDate IS NOT NULL
